All Classes

Class Description
Apollo
Class behaviour of Apollo (switch positions between two Workers)
Artemis
Class behaviour of Artemis (Worker can move twice in this turn)
Athena
Class behaviour of Athena (If one of the player's workers has leveled up in the last turn, enemy workers cannot go to cells with levels greater than theirs)
Atlas
Class behaviour of Atlas (Add a Dome in a Cell at every construction level)
BoardLayout
Game board graphics class
Cell
Class for each cell of GameBoard
CellGUI
Graphics class for game board cells
CellTest  
Chronus
Class behaviour of Chronus (You win even if there is 5 complete towers on the gameboard)
Client
Handle the connection to the server and the thread CLI
ClientHandler
ClientHandler uses by the thread for handel the client for all the game
Demeter
Class behaviour of Demeter (Worker can build twice this turn)
Divinity
Interface for divinities powers
DivinitySelect
Graphics class for the divinities choice by the first player
DivinitySelect2
Graphics class for the divinities choice by the second/third player
DivinityTest  
GameBoard
Class of the GameBoard
GameBoardTest  
GameSettings
Graphics class to set a 2 or 3 players layout
GUI  
Hephaestus
Class behaviour of Hephaestus (can build an additional block (not a dome) above the first block)
Hestia
Class behaviour of Hestia (Your worker can build once more, but not in a perimetral cell.)
JoinLobby
Graphics class for waiting players
LobbyReady
Graphics class to sum up game settings (player, divinity chosen, name)
Minotaur
Class behaviour of Minotaur (can move to an opposing worker's cell (according to the normal rules of the move) if the next cell in the same direction is free.
NotifyGUI
When the CLI is deactivated, NotifyCLi receives the notifications to update it
NotifyServer
Handle the logic of the game
Pan
Class behaviour of Pan (win even if your worker has fallen two or more levels)
Player
Class of player
PlayerTest  
Poseidon
Class behaviour of Poseidon(Your worker can build until three times more if the other worker of the player is in a ground level cell.)
Prometheus
Class behaviour of Prometheus
Server
Server of the game, established new connection with the client and create new thread for each client, in order to handle it.
StartMenu
Graphics class to start GUI and insert server IP
Triton
Class behaviour of Triton (Your worker can move once more if he has moved in a perimetral cell.)
Worker
Class of Worker
WorkerController
Class for worker actions
WorkerControllerTest  
WorkerTest  
Zeus
Class behaviour of Zeus (Your worker can build a block under himself.)
